languages.text: "Без обид, но я бы не доверил тебе инвентаризировать даже дерьмо Глейто, настолько ты повредился в уме. А ведь кто-то отдал тебе на поругание всю десятину Коронуса".
"No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Expanse's entire tithe to freely desecrate."
languages.original_text: "Без обид, но я бы не доверил тебе инвентаризировать даже дерьмо Глейто, настолько ты повредился в уме. А ведь кто-то отдал тебе на поругание всю десятину Коронуса".

traits.locale_text: "No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Koronus's entire tithe to freely desecrate."
"No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Koronus's entire tithe to freely desecrate."
"No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Koronus's entire tithe to freely desecrate."
"No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Koronus's entire tithe to freely desecrate."
"No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Expanse's entire tithe to freely desecrate."
"No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Expanse's entire tithe to freely desecrate."

languages.text: «No se ofenda, pero no le confiaría ni un inventario de las cagadas de Glaito con su demencia. Pensar que alguien le ha entregado el diezmo de la Extensión al completo para que lo profane a su gusto...».
languages.original_text: "No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Expanse's entire tithe to freely desecrate."

traits.locale_text: «No se ofenda, pero no le confiaría ni un inventario de las cagadas de Glaito con su demencia. Pensar que alguien le ha entregado el diezmo de la Extensión al completo para que lo profane a su gusto...».

languages.text: “无意冒犯，但就算是格雷托的粪便，我也不会交给你来清点，因为你已经彻底疯了。想想看，居然有人把整个科罗努斯扩区的什一税都交到你手里，任由你肆意亵渎。”
languages.original_text: "No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Expanse's entire tithe to freely desecrate."

traits.locale_text: “无意冒犯，但就算是格雷托的粪便，我也不会交给你来清点，因为你已经彻底疯了。想想看，居然有人把整个科罗努斯扩区的什一税都交到你手里，任由你肆意亵渎。”

languages.text: 「悪気はないんだが、お前が錯乱しているせいで、グライトの野郎のインベントリではお前を信用していないらしい。それに、誰かがお前にエキスパンス全体の租税を粗末に扱わせているからな」
languages.original_text: "No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Expanse's entire tithe to freely desecrate."

traits.locale_text: 「悪気はないんだが、お前が錯乱しているせいで、グライトの野郎のインベントリではお前を信用していないらしい。それに、誰かがお前にエキスパンス全体の租税を粗末に扱わせているからな」

languages.text: « Ne le prenez pas mal, mais fou comme vous êtes, je ne vous confierais même pas l'inventaire des étrons de Glaito. Et dire que quelqu'un vous a autorisé à profaner par votre incompétence l'ensemble de la dîme des Étendues... »
languages.original_text: "No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Expanse's entire tithe to freely desecrate."

traits.locale_text: « Ne le prenez pas mal, mais fou comme vous êtes, je ne vous confierais même pas l'inventaire des étrons de Glaito. Et dire que quelqu'un vous a autorisé à profaner par votre incompétence l'ensemble de la dîme des Étendues... »

languages.text: "Gücenme ama ne kadar kaçık olduğuna bakarsak Glaito'nun bokunun envanterini bile sana emanet etmezdim. Bir de kalkmışlar, tüm Enginlik'in aşarını dilediğince kirletmen için sana vermişler. Olacak iş değil."
languages.original_text: "No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Expanse's entire tithe to freely desecrate."

traits.locale_text: "Gücenme ama ne kadar kaçık olduğuna bakarsak Glaito'nun bokunun envanterini bile sana emanet etmezdim. Bir de kalkmışlar, tüm Enginlik'in aşarını dilediğince kirletmen için sana vermişler. Olacak iş değil."

languages.text: "Nichts für ungut, aber so verrückt wie Ihr seid, würde ich Euch nicht einmal mit der Inventur von Glaitos Scheiße betrauen. Unfassbar, dass Euch jemand den gesamten Zehnt der Ausdehnung anvertraut hat."
languages.original_text: "No offence, but I would not trust you with an inventory of Glaito's shit, what with how deranged you are. And to think that someone gave you the Expanse's entire tithe to freely desecrate."

traits.locale_text: "Nichts für ungut, aber so verrückt wie Ihr seid, würde ich Euch nicht einmal mit der Inventur von Glaitos Scheiße betrauen. Unfassbar, dass Euch jemand den gesamten Zehnt der Ausdehnung anvertraut hat."
